name: TP Time!
description:
The Coronavirus has gone wild! The whole country has gone into lockdown. No one wants to go outside. But one mad scientist created you! The Robo-shopper 3000! Your goal is to go out and catch as much toilet paper and other cleaning products as you can. While avoiding meteor, slip signs, and the dreaded random red shopping cart!

Use arrow keys to move on computer and the buttons on screen to move on mobile devices!

A single roll of TP will give you 10 points!

A pack of TP will give you 100!

A thing of Hand Sanitizer will grant you 300 points!    

Every now and then a Red Cart will come from the left of the screen, make sure to jump over it! Make sure to dodge the meteors falling from the sky and avoid the Slip Signs until they disappear when they hit the ground!

Music created by Evan King below is the link:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ehGVFqIZas&list=WL&index=2&t=0s

My Youtube Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8ZU9qoitfFJnmwXvd1M09g
